west
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]
West lake district (place name)/Xihu district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang/Xihu district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi

sentences.english: Mountain flowers in the previous award and award-winning West Lake Expo a few ranking highest in the province.
sentences.chinese: 在歷次山花獎和西湖博覽會上獲獎數均居全省前茅。

sentences.english: West Lake osmanthus lotus root starch, win set cake, double happiness, wonton dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 西湖桂花藕粉，定勝糕，幸福雙，餛飩小籠。

sentences.english: I went to the West Lake to see them yesterday, there already many people gathered and took pictures of them.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我去西湖邊看它們，那兒已經有很多人在拍照了。

sentences.english: Scenery near the West Lake is actually a love picture.
sentences.chinese: 西湖邊的風景，確是一幅愛情的畫卷。

sentences.english: And then the lake itself is like a plate which spreads before the eyes of the outlooker.
sentences.chinese: 在外來者眼前，西湖看起來就像是一個平放着的圓盤。

sentences.english: My sister likes to go sight-seeing in a pleasure boat around the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜歡坐遊舫繞着西湖觀光遊玩。

sentences.english: From West Lake in Hangzhou, this tea has a bright color and a pleasant fresh taste.
sentences.chinese: 源自杭州西湖，茶湯明亮清澈，清新爽口。

sentences.english: Broken Bridge remaining snow is the famous scene of West- Lake, belong to one of ten scenes of West-Lake.
sentences.chinese: 斷橋殘雪是西湖上著名的景色，屬於西湖十景之一。

sentences.english: Broken Bridge remaining snow is the famous scene of West- Lake, belong to one of ten scenes of West-Lake.
sentences.chinese: 斷橋殘雪是西湖上著名的景色，屬於西湖十景之一。

sentences.english: West Lake seemed blurry, and you could only faintly see half of Su Dike.
sentences.chinese: 西湖看起來朦朦朧朧的，蘇堤也只能隱約看到一半。

sentences.english: Reservoir characteristics of Donghai Xihu Sag were introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了東海西湖凹陷的儲層特徵。

sentences.english: SiMing Lake has West Lake's beauty and Dong Ting Lake's pizzazz.
sentences.chinese: 四明湖，既有西湖的秀麗又有洞庭湖的瀟灑。

sentences.english: On Hubin Road, I walked alongside West Lake beneath swaying willow trees.
sentences.chinese: 在湖濱路，我沿着西湖穿行在搖曳的垂柳下。

sentences.english: Walking around West Lake is supremely pleasant after the buzz of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在經歷了上海的喧鬧之後，在西湖邊走是極端的享受。

sentences.english: In the process of certain west lake dredging and rectification, large amount of lakebed mud is used to fill pond.
sentences.chinese: 某市西湖整治清淤過程中，大量湖底淤泥被用於填塘。

sentences.english: To be more precise, I’m gonna talk about the intercity express train, the west lake and the soysauced Dongpo Pork.
sentences.chinese: 具體來說，我想談談城際特快列車，西湖和東坡肉。

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
lit. there is heaven above, and there is 蘇杭|苏杭[Su1 Hang2] below (idiom)/fig. the beauty and affluence of Suzhou and Hangzhou is comparable with heaven
